GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v6.0
GSD.description:
ice: Don't double unplug aux on peer initiated reset

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0 by commit 23c619190318376769ad7b61504c2ea0703fb783, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit f9f5301e7e2d4fa2445aab3ec889dac6b34ea63e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ice: Don't double unplug aux on peer initiated reset
